description: Try our easy to follow Pickled Rhubarb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pickled Rhubarb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece fresh ginger, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place vinegar, sugar, peppercorns, mustard seeds, cloves, ginger, chilli flakes, bay leaves and salt flakes into a saucepan with 1 cup boiling water. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Set aside to cool.

Place rhubarb into 5cup capacity sterilised jar. Pour cooled mixture over rhubarb and cover with lid immediately. Stand until cooled. Store in refrigerator for 48 hours before using. The rhubarb pickle will keep in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
